author: bencomic

right.text: vgame not necessarily. he has a MILD section with no porn, the furry porn is in the SPICY section. ...i'll never look at that word in the same way again ever

left.text: no. i'd have to see the pictures, and i think i've seen enough of that

right.text: every time i think of the word 'spicy' i'll think of husky semen. and that's just sad.

left.text: yeah, but that's boring. there's no watersports in mild.

title: I agree. Take me to the spicy page.
